title: WHEN LIFE KNOCKS YOU
itunes:title: WHEN LIFE KNOCKS YOU
itunes:subtitle: Motiversity
description:
When life knocks you down, you always have two choices — get up and move forward or stay on the ground and accept defeat. One of the Best Motivational Speeches Ever featuring Coach Pain (https://bit.ly/CoachPainMotiversity) and Dr. Jessica Houston (https://bit.ly/DrJessicaHoustonMotiversity).


Music by Secession Studios (https://bit.ly/SecessionStudiosYouTube).


Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
